item.description:
This is a very affordable way to immerse yourself in permaculture for two days - whether you are new to permaculture or already have some training or experience. You will come away with practical skills that you can apply to your life (urban, suburban or rural).

**please see the flier posted under "files" at left for full details**
**please share these details with anyone who might be interested**

Charles and Julia have taught permaculture all over the world. They currently have a wonderful permaculture home for sale in North Whitefield, ME and live in Hawaii.

Join us for this great event! Remember that it's $135 for the WHOLE weekend if you register by 4/15.

WE CURRENTLY HAVE SPACE FOR A COUPLE OF ADDITIONAL ATTENDEES! (as of 4/18)

Please see the flyer with syllabus in the "files" area to learn more about the course then REGISTER HERE!!!

group.name: Portland Maine Permaculture & The Resilience Hub

item.name: Permaculture for the Northeast 2-Day Workshop
